title: [Lore Sketches] Yago, the Estranged Shaman.

replies.body: Give me a week or so, and I could come up with a passable kit, if you could give me a bit more info on what powers Yago possesses. Is he a traditional shaman, harnessing the power of the elements? If so, does he specialise in any one, or is he more well-rounded? I noticed in the short lore paragraph you gave, you mentioned the power of twenty suns. Does this mean Yago is mostly attuned to fire? Any info would be a great help, and I'd love to see if this could come to fruition!
